channel.title: RE-Invented 718! New, 24/7 VPS! 100% Uptime Join Now!
channel.description:
Farming, Both Falador & Catherby allotments & Ardougne 90% Ish Lodestones (Don't have the small cutscene yet) Prestige System Summoning Completionist Cape Requirements Skiller Cape Requirements Trivia Game via World message Lost-City Quest Bones on altar Every skill trainable/working Squeal Of Fortune Abyss Tree Farming @ Falador Park Shooting Stars Bonecrusher + Demon horn necklace Toolbelts (Started) Excavating statue for secret training location lol A Start on Construction, Have loading objects in Preview mode, and Building of objects in Build Mode. In-Game Highscores In-Game Drop Log Added Dwarf Cannon & Royal Cannon Fixed Corporal Beast Safe Spotting + Sea Troll Queen safe spotting. Fixed some small bugs such as Magic bow special attack and crystal bow attack (Crystal Bows GFX was at the players feet) Added Money Pouch, works in trade, shops and picking up from floor. And Lots Lots More!
Client (Jar) Download - http://uppit.com/u6i6y97723bh/Re-Invented.jar
Website - http://re-inventedrsps.enjin.com/ (Beta)
WebClient - On the Way
We are temporally Looking For a staff!! So Join and maybe earn you way in!
Thanks all For playing -Tyler -Austin
